meta.title: Blue Venture Fund | City Side Ventures
meta.description: Blue Venture is a Michigan-based venture capital fund established to invest in fast-growing, scalable, and post-revenue tech companies located in the U.S. and North America. The purpose of the Blue Venture Fund is to grow the North American startup ecosystem and will provide capital investments of up to $5M per deal to qualified and approved companies.

name: Blue Venture
intro: Blue Venture is a Michigan-based venture capital fund established to invest in fast-growing, scalable, and post-revenue tech companies located in the U.S. and North America. The purpose of the Blue Venture Fund is to grow the North American startup ecosystem and will provide capital investments of up to $5M per deal to qualified and approved companies.
fundingRequirements: The company must have at a minimum of $2M in annual revenue
The company is at a profitable stage
minimumQualifications: The company must be registered in the United States.
The company must be in located and operate within the United States.
Company ownership of 51% by a founder of United States residency.
Must be a for-profit business entity.
Must have a fully functioning product or service.
market: Venture Capital Fund, Series A - C
